description: This file defines a JPA entity class GateEntity that maps to the 'gates' database table, providing properties and accessors for gate information in the flight status service platform.

classes.name: GateEntity
classes.description: JPA entity mapping for the 'gates' database table, representing a gate with properties like ID, code, terminal, status, and timestamps.

methods.name: GateEntity
methods.description: Protected default constructor for JPA framework initialization.
